snippet: Egypt’s president, Mohamed Morsi, told a room full of politicians who had just laid out all the covert ways that their country could stop a Nile River dam project in Ethiopia that they were on live television.
abstract: Egypt’s president, Mohamed Morsi, told a room full of politicians who had just laid out all the covert ways that their country could stop a Nile River dam project in Ethiopia that they were on live television.

headline.main: With Cameras Rolling, Egyptian Politicians Threaten Ethiopia Over Dam
